title: BR log backup checkpoint lag > 10 min sometimes
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
/ # /tikv-server -V
TiKV
Release Version:   6.2.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   23588581613251bdec283764a604197dd00ca377
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.2.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2022-07-14 11:03:14

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
K8s

### Steps to reproduce
1. Start K8S cluster PD/TiDB: 4U 8Gï¼Œ TiKV: 8U 16G
2. Start log backup 
3. Run full backup
4. Run workload (QPS: insert&update 1K)
5. Check log backup checkpoint status 

### What did you expect?
Checkpoint lag should be less than 10 min (RPO < 10 min)

### What did happened?
checkpoint lag > 10 minutes sometimes

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7403864/179187531-f9324da8-3153-4563-a285-da11b992311f.png)

comments_data.body: checkpoint lag sometimes > 10min is not critical. mark it minor.
